tools.name: convert_to_markdown
tools.description:
Converts various input formats (HTTP/HTTPS web pages, local files, and data URIs) into structured Markdown.

    Args:
        input_source: The source to convert (e.g., "https://example.com", "file:///path/to/file.html", or "data:text/html,...").
        preserve_structure: If True, retains original formatting (default: True).

    Returns:
        A string containing the structured Markdown output.

    Raises:
        ValueError: If the input source is invalid or unsupported.
        httpx.HTTPStatusError: If fetching web content fails.
        FileNotFoundError: If local file cannot be found.
        PermissionError: If local file cannot be accessed.

convert_to_markdown.purpose: 验证工具能够处理内嵌的data URI形式的HTML内容并正确转换为Markdown。

response.error:
ToolException: Error executing tool convert_to_markdown: Conversion failed: [Errno 22] Invalid argument: '

Test

'

convert_to_markdown.purpose: 测试输入源格式错误时是否抛出ValueError。

response.error: ToolException: Error executing tool convert_to_markdown: Conversion failed: Unsupported input source: invalid-source-format

convert_to_markdown.purpose: 测试空数据URI是否被正确处理或抛出适当错误。

response.error: ToolException: Error executing tool convert_to_markdown: File not found: data:text/html,
